jp_clean: 「オディールはお店で補給品の買い物をしているはず。タルに囲まれている建物だよ！」

en_clean: "I saw Bonnie go to the east! They're probably near the veggie fields... Just go east and then south!"

en_clean: "And Isabeau must be at the Favor Tree to the west. Give him some time though! I think he has a lot to ask for!"

en_clean: "Before you go talk to him, you could walk around Dormont? I'm sure people would be happy to talk!"

en_clean: "There's a little girl with pigtails slightly north, I think she really likes to talk about battles... Don't be afraid to talk to anyone in the village!"

jp_clean: 「北の方に行くと、おさげの女の子がいるよ。戦闘について話すのが好きみたい... 村の人たちと話すのを恐れないでね！」

en_clean: "And, well, also, you should see the Change God's statue and pray for victory! If you want!!! (You really should!!!)"
